BACHELOR OF PHYSICAL EDUCATION (B.P.Ed.)
Intake:50
Duration:One Year Full Time
Eligibility:
Graduate with Minimum 45% Marks
Age Below 28 Years on July
An Active Interest in taking part in Games & Sports Activities
  Part - I
  Theory Papers- All are Compulsory
  � Principals And History Physical Education
  � Anatomy, Physiology and Exercise, Health Education
  � Organization, Administration and Supervision
  � Education and Sports Physiology in Physical Education
  � Methods of Teaching
  � Officiating and Coaching

  Part - II
  Practical
  � Athletics
  � Gymnastics & Yoga
  � Major Games

  Part - III
  Teaching Ability, Practice of Teaching and Project Work
  � Teaching Ability, Practice of Teaching and Project Work
  � Specialized Lesson Plan
  � Project Work
